text: Brrda phu ptiseth kar sraththa thang ca kxahˌ lu lki tab læa cak brrda mu chri knan tang mi chxb thi ca hı mi khwam di dı «cak phracea khxng phwk cea thuk prathan lng ma kæ phwk cea læa xallxhˌ nan ca thrng ceaacng khwam kruna khxng phraxngkh kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng pra sngkh læa xallxhˌ nan pen phu mi buy khun xan hıy hlwng
